metadata.title: CVE-2022-48339 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GNU Emacs through 28.2. htmlfontify.el has acommand injection vulnerability. In the hfy-istext-command function, theparameter file and parameter srcdir come from external input, andparameters are not escaped. If a file name or directory name contains shellmetacharacters, code may be executed.

criterions.comment: emacs package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
xemacs21 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
xemacs21-packages package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
